00034 #include <stdlib.h>
00035 #include <string.h>

00037 #include "MEM_guardedalloc.h"

00039 #include "BLI_utildefines.h"
00040 #include "BLI_edgehash.h"
00041 #include "BLI_mempool.h"

00043 /**************inlined code************/
00044 static unsigned int _ehash_hashsizes[]= {
00045     1, 3, 5, 11, 17, 37, 67, 131, 257, 521, 1031, 2053, 4099, 8209,
00046     16411, 32771, 65537, 131101, 262147, 524309, 1048583, 2097169,
00047     4194319, 8388617, 16777259, 33554467, 67108879, 134217757,
00048     268435459
00049 };
00050 
00051 #define EDGE_HASH(v0, v1)  ((v0 * 39)^(v1 * 31))
00052 
00053 /* ensure v0 is smaller */
00054 #define EDGE_ORD(v0, v1) \
00055     if (v0 > v1) {       \
00056         v0 ^= v1;        \
00057         v1 ^= v0;        \
00058         v0 ^= v1;        \
00059     }
00060 
00061 /***/
00062 
00063 typedef struct EdgeEntry EdgeEntry;
00064 struct EdgeEntry {
00065     EdgeEntry *next;
00066     unsigned int v0, v1;
00067     void *val;
00068 };
00069 
00070 struct EdgeHash {
00071     EdgeEntry **buckets;
00072     BLI_mempool *epool;
00073     int nbuckets, nentries, cursize;
00074 };
00075 
00076 /***/
00077 
00078 EdgeHash *BLI_edgehash_new(void)
00079 {
00080     EdgeHash *eh = MEM_callocN(sizeof(*eh), "EdgeHash");
00081     eh->cursize = 0;
00082     eh->nentries = 0;
00083     eh->nbuckets = _ehash_hashsizes[eh->cursize];
00084     
00085     eh->buckets = MEM_callocN(eh->nbuckets * sizeof(*eh->buckets), "eh buckets 2");
00086     eh->epool = BLI_mempool_create(sizeof(EdgeEntry), 512, 512, BLI_MEMPOOL_SYSMALLOC);
00087 
00088     return eh;
00089 }
00090 
00091 
00092 void BLI_edgehash_insert(EdgeHash *eh, unsigned int v0, unsigned int v1, void *val)
00093 {
00094     unsigned int hash;
00095     EdgeEntry *e = BLI_mempool_alloc(eh->epool);
00096 
00097     /* this helps to track down errors with bad edge data */
00098     BLI_assert(v0 != v1);
00099 
00100     EDGE_ORD(v0, v1); /* ensure v0 is smaller */
00101 
00102     hash = EDGE_HASH(v0, v1) % eh->nbuckets;
00103 
00104     e->v0 = v0;
00105     e->v1 = v1;
00106     e->val = val;
00107     e->next = eh->buckets[hash];
00108     eh->buckets[hash]= e;
00109 
00110     if (++eh->nentries>eh->nbuckets * 3) {
00111         EdgeEntry *e, **old = eh->buckets;
00112         int i, nold = eh->nbuckets;
00113 
00114         eh->nbuckets = _ehash_hashsizes[++eh->cursize];
00115         eh->buckets = MEM_mallocN(eh->nbuckets * sizeof(*eh->buckets), "eh buckets");
00116         memset(eh->buckets, 0, eh->nbuckets * sizeof(*eh->buckets));
00117 
00118         for (i = 0; i < nold; i++) {
00119             for (e = old[i]; e;) {
00120                 EdgeEntry *n = e->next;
00121 
00122                 hash = EDGE_HASH(e->v0, e->v1) % eh->nbuckets;
00123                 e->next = eh->buckets[hash];
00124                 eh->buckets[hash]= e;
00125 
00126                 e = n;
00127             }
00128         }
00129 
00130         MEM_freeN(old);
00131     }
00132 }
00133 
00134 void **BLI_edgehash_lookup_p(EdgeHash *eh, unsigned int v0, unsigned int v1)
00135 {
00136     unsigned int hash;
00137     EdgeEntry *e;
00138 
00139     EDGE_ORD(v0, v1); /* ensure v0 is smaller */
00140 
00141     hash = EDGE_HASH(v0, v1) % eh->nbuckets;
00142     for (e = eh->buckets[hash]; e; e = e->next)
00143         if (v0 == e->v0 && v1 == e->v1)
00144             return &e->val;
00145 
00146     return NULL;
00147 }
00148 
00149 void *BLI_edgehash_lookup(EdgeHash *eh, unsigned int v0, unsigned int v1)
00150 {
00151     void **value_p = BLI_edgehash_lookup_p(eh, v0, v1);
00152 
00153     return value_p?*value_p:NULL;
00154 }
00155 
00156 int BLI_edgehash_haskey(EdgeHash *eh, unsigned int v0, unsigned int v1)
00157 {
00158     return BLI_edgehash_lookup_p(eh, v0, v1) != NULL;
00159 }
00160 
00161 int BLI_edgehash_size(EdgeHash *eh)
00162 {
00163     return eh->nentries;
00164 }
00165 
00166 void BLI_edgehash_clear(EdgeHash *eh, EdgeHashFreeFP valfreefp)
00167 {
00168     int i;
00169     
00170     for (i = 0; i<eh->nbuckets; i++) {
00171         EdgeEntry *e;
00172         
00173         for (e = eh->buckets[i]; e; ) {
00174             EdgeEntry *n = e->next;
00175             
00176             if (valfreefp) valfreefp(e->val);
00177             BLI_mempool_free(eh->epool, e);
00178             
00179             e = n;
00180         }
00181         eh->buckets[i] = NULL;
00182     }
00183 
00184     eh->nentries = 0;
00185 }
00186 
00187 void BLI_edgehash_free(EdgeHash *eh, EdgeHashFreeFP valfreefp)
00188 {
00189     BLI_edgehash_clear(eh, valfreefp);
00190 
00191     BLI_mempool_destroy(eh->epool);
00192 
00193     MEM_freeN(eh->buckets);
00194     MEM_freeN(eh);
00195 }

00198 /***/

00200 struct EdgeHashIterator {
00201     EdgeHash *eh;
00202     int curBucket;
00203     EdgeEntry *curEntry;
00204 };
00205 
00206 EdgeHashIterator *BLI_edgehashIterator_new(EdgeHash *eh)
00207 {
00208     EdgeHashIterator *ehi = MEM_mallocN(sizeof(*ehi), "eh iter");
00209     ehi->eh = eh;
00210     ehi->curEntry = NULL;
00211     ehi->curBucket = -1;
00212     while (!ehi->curEntry) {
00213         ehi->curBucket++;
00214         if (ehi->curBucket == ehi->eh->nbuckets)
00215             break;
00216         ehi->curEntry = ehi->eh->buckets[ehi->curBucket];
00217     }
00218     return ehi;
00219 }
00220 void BLI_edgehashIterator_free(EdgeHashIterator *ehi)
00221 {
00222     MEM_freeN(ehi);
00223 }
00224 
00225 void BLI_edgehashIterator_getKey(EdgeHashIterator *ehi, unsigned int *v0_r, unsigned int *v1_r)
00226 {
00227     if (ehi->curEntry) {
00228         *v0_r = ehi->curEntry->v0;
00229         *v1_r = ehi->curEntry->v1;
00230     }
00231 }
00232 void *BLI_edgehashIterator_getValue(EdgeHashIterator *ehi)
00233 {
00234     return ehi->curEntry?ehi->curEntry->val:NULL;
00235 }
00236 
00237 void BLI_edgehashIterator_setValue(EdgeHashIterator *ehi, void *val)
00238 {
00239     if (ehi->curEntry) {
00240         ehi->curEntry->val = val;
00241     }
00242 }
00243 
00244 void BLI_edgehashIterator_step(EdgeHashIterator *ehi)
00245 {
00246     if (ehi->curEntry) {
00247         ehi->curEntry = ehi->curEntry->next;
00248         while (!ehi->curEntry) {
00249             ehi->curBucket++;
00250             if (ehi->curBucket == ehi->eh->nbuckets) {
00251                 break;
00252             }
00253 
00254             ehi->curEntry = ehi->eh->buckets[ehi->curBucket];
00255         }
00256     }
00257 }
00258 int BLI_edgehashIterator_isDone(EdgeHashIterator *ehi)
00259 {
00260     return !ehi->curEntry;
00261 }
